Title: [Beta] The Escort
Description:
A mod that will add The Escort and (eventually) their very special slugpup.
[i]Thank You Eclipse Shadow Scale for the headshot![/i]

Currently implements The Escort and some of their abilities and movement tech. 
[i]Should[/i] be fully compatible for playing in other campaigns or arena.

[b]Feedback of any sort is HIGHLY appreciated![/b]

Found a bug? Put it in the forums or reach me in Discord! I'm in the main RW discord server (as [b]Deathpits[/b]). Feel free to ping me!

[hr][/hr][h2]<~DISCLAIMER~>[/h2]
Escort's campaign doesn't exist, there's no custom assets, and this may or may not alter the behaviour of other slugcats by pure accident (it's unlikely for this to happen)...
[hr][/hr][h2]<~CONFLICTING MODS/KNOWN ISSUES~>[/h2]
These mods may or may not cause issues with the Escort mod, or these are issues that have been found and will be fixed eventually
[list]
[*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2924848641]Rico Spear[/url]: [b]Apparently causes Brawler Escort to explode when shanking[/b] (Confirmed to kill Brawler Escort upon "shanking")
[*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2931679448]SimplifiedMoveset[/url]: [b]Affects Escort gameplay significantly![/b] Many of Escort's movement adjustments don't work when this is turned on, such as the sick flip and low pounce (which makes aiming drop-kicks harder). Use at your own risk!
[*] [b]Campaign:[/b] Garbage Waste doesn't work properly
[*] [b]Campaign:[/b] When playing COOP in Escort's Campaign, the food intake doesn't work properly (gives you too much food actually)
[*] [b]Campaign:[/b] Escort starts in water... that'll be fixed once I make a custom room.
[*] [b]General:[/b] Spearthrowing mechanics are still a wee bit janky and needs cleanup.
[*] [b]Campaign:[/b] Upon entering Moon's chamber, the game will soft-crash (this is recoverable by using warp mod to warp to a different room)
[*] [b]Campaign:[/b] Moon's structure's physics are borken
[*] And probably more, there are way too many mods to test this character with...
[/list]
[hr][/hr][h2]<~PATCHED MODS~>[/h2]
This mod will apply a patch to work better with the following mods. How they change the behaviour of the Escort mod is as detailed (Any mods not listed in either conflicts or patched may be assumed to be working):
[list]
[*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2950327774]Revivify[/url]: [b]Somewhat patched for 1.2.0[/b] (Doesn't work as well on slugpups...)
[*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2948971756]Dress My Slugcat 1.4.X[/url]: [b]Patched![/b] (Custom sprite ready? Who knows.)
[*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2928004252]Rotund World 1.6.X[/url]: [b]Doesn't need patching really, but added a silly sfx and the chest marking stretch with the body![/b]
[/list]
[*] [url=][/url]: [b][/b] ()
[hr][/hr][h2]<~CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED~>[/h2]
[list]
[*] REMIX MENU to tweak some features and enable optional gimmicks
[*] Builds that alter how the character plays
[*] Custom sprites
[*] Slide Stun (sliding into creature)
[*] Drop Kick (roll/slide pouncing into creature)
[*] Flip Pounce (charge pounce)
[*] Flip wall jump (holding up or down and direction (towards the wall) while on the wall, then pressing jump after a bit)
[*] Infinite roll (that speeds up!)
[*] Dual wield spears (and dead lizards)
[*] Parryslide! (Sliding will parry most damage, including explosives!)
[*] Battle-Hyped: Keep your tired meter above a threshhold by engaging in combat to become stronger and faster. Let that adrenaline PUMP!
[*] Arc'd Spear (Monk throwing trajectory, Survivor damage (and way more when hyped!), (lesser) Gourmand forward thrust)
[*] Custom (silly) SFX!
[/list]

[list]
[*] Escort will be able to throw better in water
[*] Escort's swim speed is actually affected by their base movement speed
[*] Dropkicks will be affected by bodyweight!
[*] Lizards grabbing Escort while they're holding the lizard will no longer do a funky dance
[*] [i]Something special at 1.5k subscribers[/i] ;>
[/list]
